content.body:
FYI, I plan to post that (non-)announcement post from the Gist tonight. I also made some adjustments to it:

* I added references to the JSSugar proposal as an example of how complicated proposing new syntax has become. 
* I also added, in a second file in the Gist, an updated version of the “TC39 does not want to encourage tacit programming” #221 issue.
content.formatted_body:
FYI, I plan to post that (non-)announcement post from the Gist tonight. I also made some adjustments to it:

  • I added references to the JSSugar proposal as an example of how complicated proposing new syntax has become.
  • I also added, in a second file in the Gist, an updated version of the “TC39 does not want to encourage tacit programming” #221 issue.

content.body: I also am actually pretty excited about potentially getting `#` back from tuples, if we start considering [syntaxes other than `#[0]` for ordinal composite literals](https://github.com/acutmore/proposal-composites/issues/7). I plan to make a comment on the topic bikeshedding thread about that too.
content.formatted_body: I also am actually pretty excited about potentially getting # back from tuples, if we start considering syntaxes other than #[0] for ordinal composite literals. I plan to make a comment on the topic bikeshedding thread about that too.

I plan to make a comment on the topic bikeshedding thread about that too.
